item.title: Progressive Enhancement with Phonegap
item.description: TL;DNR Enabling native-level functionality on a hosted web app is really cool. Code reuse is also pretty cool. Beware of the gotchas. There are always gotchas. Note: This blog post is the long-form answer to this StackOverflow post I made about it (which is, at the time of writing, the #1 Google result for “progressive enhancement phonegap”). Also worth noting this guide only addresses Android right now.
